page.title: 09LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content:
{Leisure and recreation
My leisure time is spent listening to music.When I get home I have to change out of my school clothes.Then I play my tapes or watch television.I like music because when you get home you would like time to yourself,and you want school off your mind.Music always makes me forget all about it. My favourite music is pop,and I like Queen ,Shaking Stevens ,Paul Young. My favourite television programme is Coronation Street because it is true to life.I like all cartoons too ,Tom and Jerry are hilarious.When my gran and grandad come down from Todmorden, my gran goes to Lucky Days Bingo club on a Saturday because she works from 7.30 till 4.00.It is the only night she gets out.Most of all in life I like being happy and polite.
